entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
